content: पालन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पाल्-भावे ल्यु ल्युट् वा] Protecting, guarding &c.; <ls>Ki. 1. 1.</ls> --नं {@--1@} Protecting, guarding, nourishing, cherishing, fostering; लब्ध° <ls>R. 19. 3</ls>; so प्रजा°, क्षिति°, &c. {@--2@} Maintaining, observing, keeping (as a promise, vow &c.) {@--3@} The milk of a cow that has recently calved.
